00005 #ifndef LUABIND_COMPUTE_RANK_081006_HPP
00006 # define LUABIND_COMPUTE_RANK_081006_HPP
00007 
00008 # include <luabind/config.hpp>
00009 # include <luabind/detail/policy.hpp>
00010 # include <boost/mpl/apply_wrap.hpp>
00011 # include <boost/mpl/begin_end.hpp>
00012 # include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>
00013 # include <boost/mpl/next.hpp>
00014 
00015 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00016 
00017 namespace mpl = boost::mpl;
00018 
00019 template <class Idx, class Iter, class End, class Policies>
00020 int compute_score_aux(
00021     lua_State*L, int index, Idx, Iter, End end, Policies const& policies)
00022 {
00023     typedef typename Iter::type arg_type;
00024     typedef typename find_conversion_policy<Idx::value, Policies>::type
00025         conversion_policy;
00026     typedef typename mpl::apply_wrap2<
00027         conversion_policy, arg_type, lua_to_cpp>::type converter;
00028 
00029     int score = converter::match(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(arg_type), index);
00030 
00031     if (score < 0)
00032         return score;
00033 
00034     if (conversion_policy::has_arg)
00035         ++index;
00036 
00037     int next = compute_score_aux(
00038         L
00039       , index
00040       , typename mpl::next<Idx>::type()
00041       , typename mpl::next<Iter>::type()
00042       , end
00043       , policies
00044     );
00045 
00046     if (next < 0)
00047         return next;
00048 
00049     return score + next;
00050 }
00051 
00052 template <class Idx, class End, class Policies>
00053 int compute_score_aux(lua_State*, int, Idx, End, End, Policies const&)
00054 {
00055     return 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 template <class Signature, class Policies>
00059 int compute_score(lua_State* L, Signature, Policies const& policies)
00060 {
00061     return compute_score_aux(
00062         L
00063       , 1
00064       , mpl::int_<1>()
00065       , typename mpl::next<typename mpl::begin<Signature>::type>::type()
00066       , typename mpl::end<Signature>::type()
00067       , policies
00068     );
00069 }
00070 
00071 }} // namespace luabind::detail
00072 
00073 #endif // LUABIND_COMPUTE_RANK_081006_HPP
